name: WP-NoFlash
author: Nikos M.

sections.description:
!!!Further development on this project has stopped!!!

Adds a completely customizable and intuitive slideshow based on noflash jquery plugin (with more than 100 transitions including variations), which you can use from anywhere in your wordpress site (posts,pages,theme).

Development Blog

Nikos Web Development
sections.installation: Unpack the zip file to your wordpress plugins folder, then activate from wordpress plugins admin menu. Documentation is provided in documentation admin page.
sections.faq: Nikos Web Development NoFlash Plugin for WordPress
sections.changelog:
1.3.2.1

  • Minor fixes

1.3.2

  • Added 4 new transitions to slideshow plugin

1.3.1.1

  • Fixed a typo in js code (sorry for the inconvience) and tagged new minor version

1.3.1

  • Fixed minor problem with 1.3 update version

1.3

  • Fixed bug with firefox
  • Added image upload option through wordpress uploader

1.2

  • Added editor button to insert slideshows to posts/pages directly through tinyMCE

1.1

  • Minor bug with webkit browsers fixed (now flip-tiles renders correctly on webkit browsers safari,Chrome)

1.0

  • First realease
